plham

Class Fundamentals

  • plham.Fundamentals

  • public class Fundamentals
    A class for fundamental values of multiple markets (assets). This can generate multivariate geometric Brownian motion (MGBM).

    Calling setup() instantiates MGBM. Just setting the parameters (initials, drifts, volatilities, correlations) does not modify the behavior of MGBM; so call setup() to re-instanciate (setup(true) inherits the current state of MGBM).

    The initials must be specified (no defaults). On the drafts, volatilities, correlations, their default values are 0.0.
